Package org.freeplane.api

Interface Connector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConnectorRO
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Proxy.Connector
    public interface Connector
extends ConnectorRO
    Graphical connector between nodes:node.connectorsIn / node.connectorsOut - read-write.
